Posts.Content: Hi all I neee some advice please. I’m lying here awake going out my head over my op next Tuesday. I’m down for single mx and as one of four sentinel nodes affected I’ve been put down for ANC or rads or POSNAC trial.  Ruled out trial as feels too out of control. I said I don’t want ANC due to lymphodema risk as after SNBy arm is still completely numb and feels weird still and that was only four nodes and they intend taking 30.! im petrified of making wrong decision because if it returns or there is cancer still there after my chemo I will put myself through hell for not doing ANC. But the thought of lymphoedema doesn’t sit right with me either. argggh what to do????????! My heads in a spin and I need to make decision as longer surgery time will be needed Tuesday if I’m not too late already. My oncologist can’t give me reassurance I need and surgeon has said I’m doing right thing but I have to decide. I hate these decisions as I have really bad anxiety and cant cope with responsibility of playing Russian roulette. I almost wish they’d decide for me or I had more than one affected so decision taken off hands. Surely they can do ultrasound to see if cancer still in there after chemo ?????
Posts.Title: Ancillary node clearance have or not?

Posts.Title: Ancillary node clearance

Posts.Content: Hey you didn’t scare me it’s fine I’m scared anyway lol. I’m finding even though I’m keeping busy I’m so distracted I can’t concentrate especially on paperwork.  I have a banging headache today too. Is it normal to feel pain down your arm with it? I’m feeling weird on my left side where the lump is. I’m struggling today xx
Posts.Title: Worried about breast lump I’m beside myself with worry

Posts.Content: Hi Optimistic thanks for reply. Have you had your mastectomy now? Can I ask if you so wish can they take both breast away or only the affected one?  I’m thinking if I do have to have surgery I’d prefer implants as the one thing that may come out of this is I get bigger boobs. Every cloud and all that
Posts.Title: Worried about breast lump I’m beside myself with worry

Posts.Content: Hi everybody, I found a breast lump yesterday evening like it had come from nowhere in my left breast. It’s a hard mass with a pea sized lump on top of it.  My sister had breast cancer 3 years ago and they caught it on routine mammogram at nearly stage 4. She was lucky, the following week she had mastectomy. Hers was also left breast. I’m so so scared guys. I went to the hospital earlier to walk in clinic but nothing he could do other than refer me to breast clinic urgently and told me to go drs Monday urgently because of my family history.  He gave me diazepam to help me sleep and relax. I’m devastated and I don’t know where to turn if I’m honest  Please help me
Posts.Title: Worried about breast lump I’m beside myself with worry

Posts.Content: Yes I had fibroadenoma in my thirties and all was clear and well x
Posts.Title: Worried about breast lump I’m beside myself with worry

Posts.Content: Time is just going so slow it’s right at my main focus of attention it’s so hard to concentrate on anything. I don’t mind chemo or radiotherapy it’s the surgery that I dread if needed. That sounds so vain but my sister lost all her hair and I’m so upset that this has all started the new year off. This was going to be my best year ever then god went and stuffed that up big time for me with this. Had so many challenges in life I don’t think I can fight this one now just have no energy at all.  How did you all get through the initial wait? Xx
Posts.Title: Worried about breast lump I’m beside myself with worry

Posts.Content: Thank you Iceberg sorry my head all over place I did see your post though so I guess my tests will be same. I expected as much re my son so he has to go back to work so I’ve said no point him waiting around.
Posts.Title: Worried about breast lump I’m beside myself with worry

Posts.Content: Thank you so much for your lovely replies. Can I ask you if yours appeared just overnight like mine has that’ it’s more likely to be an aggressive cancer than a fatty tissue or lump? I’ve had fibroadenoma in past given all clear from that in 30’s.  I’ve had major issues with my stomach with alternating diarrhoea constipation and heartburn so my main focus has been possible bowel cancer and I have appt on 8th feb for that so to get this too had completely thrown me. I can’t stop worrying or preparing for worst that’s just me. It’s actually now always aching xx
Posts.Title: Worried about breast lump I’m beside myself with worry

Posts.Content: Yes that’s true night times are worse! The dr at walk in clinic today prescribed me some diazepam which I haven’t had for years but he could tell I was quite anxious about it all as I suffer with generalised anxiety disorder anyway.  My sister is doing fine now thank you she has chemo radiotherapy and a mastectomy left side again so it’s just a case of keeping calm keeping busy and staying positive.  Thank you so much for all your replies they mean a lot to me
Posts.Title: Worried about breast lump I’m beside myself with worry

Posts.Content: Hi everyone sorry I’ve not replied but as you can imagine it’s been a frantic time.  So I went to my GP yesterday and he confirmed the lump as being a 2 by 1 cm triangular mass and I’m being seen Friday at the breast clinic. I swear to god the look on their faces said it all. They were all looking at it there was two male drs and a chaperone and I wanted to cry when he said pass the tape measure. I’m really struggling with the mental side of things.  I know a lot of healers through the internet and she kindly told me what to buy as I was food shopping last night. Said everything from scratch and had a reiki session last night.  I don’t have a partner so my 24 year old son is coming with me Friday. Will I have all my tests done Friday at the clinic? The strange thing is I sleep terribly but could sleep for England right now and the dr asked me if I was fatigued or had been more than usual. I suffer with fibromyalgia so that’s not unusual. I can’t get the look on his face out my mind I wasn’t imagining it it’s that pitying look. Every morning when I wake up it hits me full on what I’m facing that’s probably why I’m enjoying sleeping because I’m not worrying then. I’m trying to keep it together but I can hardly breathe at times.
Posts.Title: Worried about breast lump I’m beside myself with worry

Posts.Content: That’s the thing though I was feeling calm last night when I went to bed but today I’ve ached from moment I got up intil now even after an Epsom salt bath which usually knocks it on head.  Thank you for your kind reply Helen xx
Posts.Title: Secondaries

Posts.Content: I’m getting really nervous and anxious. I’m hoping somebody can maybe reassure me. I’ve found a lump and have been for tests and waiting for biopsy results this Friday morning. I had the tests yesterday.  Since I woke up this morning (after a 9 hour sleep which is unheard of for me) I’ve ached all over including my back, my neck, my hips, my neck, everywhere, but the thing that’s worrying me the most is I’ve got a really achey dull pain and sometimes sharp under my right rib at the bottom and I just feel generally really ill. Even my sides hurt. I’m starting to worry I’ve got secondaries and I’m scared. Any advice?
Posts.Title: Secondaries
